casebody.data:
STATE
v.
GRAHAM 2016-1882 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 10, 2019

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On appellant's pro se motion for leave to amend appellant's merit brief and appellant's second pro se motion for leave to amend appellant's merit brief. Motions denied.

STEWART, J., dissents and would deny appellant's pro se motion for leave to amend appellant's merit brief and grant appellant's second pro se motion for leave to amend appellant's merit brief and order briefing on supplemental proposition of law No. 1.
